name: lucky-egg
effect: Held: Increases any Exp the holder gains by 50%.
short_effect: Held: Increases EXP earned in battle by 50%.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an egg filled with happiness that earns extra Exp. Points in battle.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an egg filled with happiness that earns extra Exp. Points in battle.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an egg filled with happiness that earns extra Exp. Points in battle.
